mapper.select: select rid, myshop_product.pid, pname, category_id, rcontent, rwriter, oid, score, rfile, recom, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from MYSHOP_REVIEW, myshop_product where MYSHOP_REVIEW.pid = myshop_product.pid
select score, rwriter, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, rcontent, pname, recom, rsfile, rid, oid from myshop_review, myshop_product where rid = #{rid} and myshop_review.pid = myshop_product.pid

select mr.score, mr.rcontent, mr.rsfile, mp.pname, mp.brand, mp.price, mp.psfile, mp.pid, mp.category_id, mr.oid, mr.rwriter from myshop_review mr, myshop_product mp where rid = #{rid} and mr.pid = mp.pid

select rid, myshop_product.pid, pname, category_id, rcontent, rwriter, oid, score, rfile, recom, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from MYSHOP_REVIEW, myshop_product where MYSHOP_REVIEW.pid = myshop_product.pid
mapper.update: update myshop_review set score = #{score}, rcontent = #{rcontent}, rfile = #{rfile}, rsfile = #{rsfile} where rid= #{rid}
